lead_paragraph: Karim Mohamed-Aggad, whose brother attacked the Bataclan concert hall, was sentenced to nine years for traveling to Syria to train as a militant fighter.

headline.main: Brother of Gunman in Paris Attacks, Recruited by ISIS, Is Sent to Prison

snippet: Karim Mohamed-Aggad, whose brother attacked the Bataclan concert hall, was sentenced to nine years for traveling to Syria to train as a militant fighter....
